member.name: T:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView
member.summary: Implements an enhanced with error handling and optional auto-addition of query parameters

member.name: M:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.BackForwardEventArgs.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Set to true if wanting to go back.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.BackForwardEventArgs.GoingBack
member.summary: Indicates whether we want to go back (true) or forward (false).

member.name: F:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.BackForwardEventArgs.CanGoBackForward
member.summary: Returns true if and we can go back, or if ! and we can go forward.

member.name: M:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.InvokeScript(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the given script in the underlying native WebView.

member.name: M:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.OnNavigationStarting(System.String)
member.summary: Called when a new navigation has been requested.
member.returns: True to allow navigation, false to cancel.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationStarting
member.summary: Occurs when navigation is about to start, giving subscribers the option to cancel.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationStarted
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has actually started.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationFinished
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has finished successfully.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.NavigationFailed
member.summary: Occurs when navigation has failed.
member.remarks: The property contains the navigation failure reason or description and the property contains the error code or status value as a string.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.ScriptMessageReceived
member.summary: Occurs when a script message is received.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.SourceChanged
member.summary: Occurs to inform renderer that the has Changed.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.InvokeScriptRequested
member.summary: Occurs when a script execution is requested.

member.name: E:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CanGoBackForwardRequested
member.summary: Occurs to ask the renderer whether we can go back or forward.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CanGoBack
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user can navigate to previous pages.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.CanGoForward
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the user can navigate forward.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.QueryParam
member.summary: Gets or sets the query parameter(s) to add to all requests.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.QueryParamDomain
member.summary: Gets or sets the domain for which the query parameter will be added, or leave empty to add parameter to queries for all domains.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.PageLoadedScript
member.summary: Gets or sets the script to inject on each page load.

member.name: P:Xamify.UberWebViewLib.UberWebView.Actions
member.summary: Collection of action methods to invoke on certain actions, where key is the action and value is the method to invoke on that action occurring.
